about: Damian Chmielix, alias DJ Chmielix from Toru≈Ñ, Poland, is a renowned turntablist, DJ, and producer, whose passion for music was ignited by skateboarding and punk rock. A multiple DMC and IDA World Champion, he has been a part of several prestigious groups and founded Skratchorama Records, focusing on scratch records. Beyond music, he is an enthusiast of natural medicine, a Futurama fan, and enjoys speed cubing.
